channel.title: Tides on Dinghy - FFV4
channel.description: Recent content in Tides on Dinghy - FFV4

item.title: Sea level calculation
item.description: Calculation of the water level # The interest for the sailor is to know if there is enough water to sail. Even with a shallow draft, it is good to know where you can pass or not. This can allow you to make a short cut or to manage a sensitive channel. It is imperative to remain critical of the calculations and verify them empirically. A frequent error is the inversion between rising and falling tide.
